==Detailed Show Notes==

Dan and Jordan discuss Alex Jones' return to the studio after a couple days' absence.<ref>[https://knowledgefight.com/research/2020/4/16/episode-421-april-16-2020 Episode 421: April 16, 2020]</ref>

This episode covers:

*Alex conflates [https://apnews.com/68a9e1b91de4ffc166acd6012d82c2f9 an AP report] with a [https://www.foxnews.com/politics/coronavirus-wuhan-lab-china-compete-us-sources story from Fox News] to claim that the AP was reporting that the coronavirus originated in the Wuhan Institute of Virology lab.
*Alex attempts to minimize the coronavirus by comparing it to various plagues of the long-distant past.
*Alex lashes out at vaccines by misrepresenting [https://www.cnbc.com/video/2020/04/09/watch-cnbcs-full-interview-with-microsoft-co-founder-bill-gates-on-past-pandemic-warnings.html an interview that Bill Gates recently did with CNBC].
*Alex discusses his plan to flee Austin to an armored redoubt, which may or may not have something to do with [https://www.fda.gov/inspections-compliance-enforcement-and-criminal-investigations/warning-letters/free-speech-systems-llc-dba-infowarscom-605802-04092020 a warning letter he recently received from the FDA].
*David Knight falsely claims that Harvard professor Charles Lieber was charged with espionage. [https://www.justice.gov/opa/pr/harvard-university-professor-and-two-chinese-nationals-charged-three-separate-china-related The DOJ charged him] with making false statements.
*[https://www.timesofisrael.com/top-israeli-prof-claims-simple-stats-show-virus-plays-itself-out-after-70-days/ Isaac Ben-Israel's claims] about viruses just lasting 40 days is not a consensus opinion.
